short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Native Wallet - A secure  self-custody wallet for easy storage and usage of BTC, ETH, and other crypto.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A self-custody MPC wallet for securely storing and using BTC, ETH, and various assets.

Suitable for a wide range of Web3 users, MPC effectively reduces the complexity of wallet private key and mnemonic phrase backups without losing control over their assets, making it secure and easy to use.

Native Wallet supports BTC, ETH, Tron, and mainstream Layer 2 public chain cryptocurrencies and NFTs. It comes with a wealth of built-in DeFi applications to meet various Dapp usage scenarios for users.

**What makes Native Wallet different from other Crypto Wallets?**

Native Wallet is a keyless self-custody wallet that leverages Threshold Signature Scheme (TSS) and Multi-Party Computation (MPC) technology. From private key generation to signing, it never creates, stores, or shares private keys at any time. By using the Distributed Key Generation (DKG) protocol, it replaces traditional single atomic private keys with multiple independently created private key shards, thereby eliminating the risk of private key single-point theft.

Native Wallet - Secure & User-Friendly.
